title: KGB Watch Face
summary: The authentic watch face manufactured by Vostok Watch Company since 1940th.
description: This is a watch face for the smart watches.This watch face looks exactly like the famous watches being manufactured by Soviet watch company "Vostok" since 1940th.You can find the photos of "Komandirskie" watches line in Google: http://goo.gl/7hyUjkDespite of the fact this watch face is free it is very customizable:- You can select one of two backgrounds.- You can turn on or turn off the bezel.- When the bezel is shown you can turn on the "blink" effect.- By default in ambient mode this watch face shows realistic glowing watch face, but you can select one of four alternative modes.Also you can purchase (in app) the additional functionality:- The current date indicator.- The phone's and the watch's batteries levels indicator.This watch face is an ideal choice if you prefer a dark watch face or a black watch face. Also KGB Watch Face is very contrast watch face. This is a unique watch face on Google Play which is the authentic copy of the original Vostoks's KGB watch watch.Please wait a couple minutes after installation to allow the watch face be transfered to the watch via Bluetooth.IMPORTANT: You may have to start the app installed on your smartphone to enable the phone battery level measurement service.Tip: To configure the watchface you have to press the small gear under the watchface preview screen on your smartwatch. Also you can configure the watch face with the companion app on the phone (press a small gear in the center of the watch face's preview image).
descriptionHTML:
This is a watch face for the smart watches.

This watch face looks exactly like the famous watches being manufactured by Soviet watch company "Vostok" since 1940th.
You can find the photos of "Komandirskie" watches line in Google: http://goo.gl/7hyUjk

Despite of the fact this watch face is free it is very customizable:
- You can select one of two backgrounds.
- You can turn on or turn off the bezel.
- When the bezel is shown you can turn on the "blink" effect.
- By default in ambient mode this watch face shows realistic glowing watch face, but you can select one of four alternative modes.
Also you can purchase (in app) the additional functionality:
- The current date indicator.
- The phone's and the watch's batteries levels indicator.

This watch face is an ideal choice if you prefer a dark watch face or a black watch face. Also KGB Watch Face is very contrast watch face. This is a unique watch face on Google Play which is the authentic copy of the original Vostoks's KGB watch watch.

Please wait a couple minutes after installation to allow the watch face be transfered to the watch via Bluetooth.

IMPORTANT: You may have to start the app installed on your smartphone to enable the phone battery level measurement service.
Tip: To configure the watchface you have to press the small gear under the watchface preview screen on your smartwatch. Also you can configure the watch face with the companion app on the phone (press a small gear in the center of the watch face's preview image).
comments: Not working Time and date do not work.  Like the watch is frozen.
I love it,  the only problem is, on LG urbane 2 it crash after some time and get black screen. Fix it and I'll ware it every day  .
